text: "Living Without You" is a song recorded by English singer and songwriter Tulisa on 4 January 2015, her first single in over two years. ==Track listing== * Digital downloadLiving Without You by Tulisa, iTunes – Music, UK # "Living Without You" – 3:24 *Digital download (Remixes) #"Living Without You" (Extended Mix) – 5:18 #"Living Without You" (Brook Mason Remix) – 5:37 #"Living Without You" (Fielden Club Mix) – 5:08 ==Charts== Chart (2015) Peak position scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" scope="row" ==Release history== Region Date Format Label Ireland 4 January 2015 Digital download All Around the World, Island United Kingdom == References == Category:2014 songs Category:2015 songs Category:Tulisa songs Category:Dance songs Category:R&B; songs
title: Living Without You (Tulisa song)
